thread.section_title: Rubber Stamp Champ Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rubber Stamp Champ | rubberstampchamp.com | 4 of 160
thread.title: Jessica
thread.title_full: Rubber Stamp Champ reviewed by Jessica

author: Jessica
title: Jessica
text: I purchased a clothing stamp for my company and at check out it told me to upload a b&w jpg .. Which I did then I added additional text. My stamp should've been the logo woth text underneath.. Instead I received just the text and no logo. When I emailed customer service "Britney" replied but was not willing to correct the issue at all. I'm extremely disappointed in the order I received. I will not be purchasing from this company again.
